-- | X Haskell Bindings
--   
--   Provides low-level bindings to the X11 protocol.
--   
--   Similar to XCB - the X C Bindings.
--   
--   This library is based on version 1.6 of the xcb-proto package. See
--   http://xcb.freedesktop.org/XmlXcb/ and
--   http://xcb.freedesktop.org/dist/ .
@package xhb
@version 0.5.2014.4.10

module Graphics.XHB.Connection.Open

-- | Open a Handle to the X11 server specified in the argument. The DISPLAY
--   environment variable is consulted if the argument is null.
open :: String -> IO (Handle, Maybe Xauth, DispName)
data DispName
DispName :: String -> String -> Int -> Int -> DispName
proto :: DispName -> String
host :: DispName -> String
display :: DispName -> Int
screen :: DispName -> Int
instance Show DispName

-- | Basic functions for initiating and working with a connection to an X11
--   server.
module Graphics.XHB.Connection
data Connection

-- | Connect to the the default display.
connect :: IO (Maybe Connection)

-- | Connect to the display specified. The string must be of the format
--   used in the DISPLAY environment variable.
connectTo :: String -> IO (Maybe Connection)

-- | Returns the information about what we originally tried to connect to.
displayInfo :: Connection -> DispName

-- | Returns the <a>Setup</a> information returned by the server during the
--   initiation of the connection.
connectionSetup :: Connection -> Setup
mkConnection :: Handle -> Maybe Xauth -> DispName -> IO (Maybe Connection)
newResource :: XidLike a => Connection -> IO a
pollForEvent :: Connection -> IO (Maybe SomeEvent)
waitForEvent :: Connection -> IO SomeEvent
pollForError :: Connection -> IO (Maybe SomeError)
waitForError :: Connection -> IO SomeError

-- | If you don't feel like writing error handlers, but at least want to
--   know that one happened for debugging purposes, call this to have
--   execution come to an abrupt end if an error is received.
setCrashOnError :: Connection -> IO ()
data SomeError
data SomeEvent

-- | I plan on deprecating this one soon, but until I put together some
--   sort of <tt>utils</tt> package, it will live here.
--   
--   Given a connection, this function returns the root window of the first
--   screen.
--   
--   If your display string specifies a screen other than the first, this
--   probably doesnt do what you want.
getRoot :: Connection -> WINDOW
instance Show SetupStatus
instance Show GenericSetup
instance Deserialize SetupStatus
instance Deserialize GenericSetup
instance Deserialize GenericReply

module Graphics.XHB.Connection.Extension
type ExtensionId = String
type RequestOpCode = Word8
extensionPresent :: Connection -> ExtensionId -> IO Bool
extensionOpCode :: Connection -> ExtensionId -> IO RequestOpCode

-- | Lookup an extension. Will attempt to check the extension cache first.
--   Will block until the info is retrieved from the server. Will cache the
--   extension information when found.
extensionInfo :: Connection -> ExtensionId -> IO (QueryExtensionReply)

-- | Convert an extension request to a put action. Handles grabbing the
--   extension opcode and feeding it into the <a>serializeRequest</a>
--   function.
serializeExtensionRequest :: ExtensionRequest a => Connection -> a -> IO Put

module Graphics.XHB.Gen.BigRequests
extension :: ExtensionId
enable :: Connection -> IO (Receipt Word32)
deserializeError :: Word8 -> Maybe (Get SomeError)
deserializeEvent :: Word8 -> Maybe (Get SomeEvent)
data Enable
MkEnable :: Enable
data EnableReply
MkEnableReply :: Word32 -> EnableReply
maximum_request_length_EnableReply :: EnableReply -> Word32

module Graphics.XHB.Gen.Composite
extension :: ExtensionId
queryVersion :: Connection -> Word32 -> Word32 -> IO (Receipt QueryVersionReply)
redirectWindow :: Connection -> WINDOW -> Redirect -> IO ()
redirectSubwindows :: Connection -> WINDOW -> Redirect -> IO ()
unredirectWindow :: Connection -> WINDOW -> Redirect -> IO ()
unredirectSubwindows :: Connection -> WINDOW -> Redirect -> IO ()
createRegionFromBorderClip :: Connection -> REGION -> WINDOW -> IO ()
nameWindowPixmap :: Connection -> WINDOW -> PIXMAP -> IO ()
getOverlayWindow :: Connection -> WINDOW -> IO (Receipt WINDOW)
releaseOverlayWindow :: Connection -> WINDOW -> IO ()
deserializeError :: Word8 -> Maybe (Get SomeError)
deserializeEvent :: Word8 -> Maybe (Get SomeEvent)
data Redirect
RedirectAutomatic :: Redirect

data QueryVersion

client_minor_version_QueryVersion :: QueryVersion -> Word32

minor_version_QueryVersionReply :: QueryVersionReply -> Word32
data RedirectWindow

update_UnredirectSubwindows :: UnredirectSubwindows -> Redirect
data CreateRegionFromBorderClip

window_CreateRegionFromBorderClip :: CreateRegionFromBorderClip -> WINDOW
data NameWindowPixmap

pixmap_NameWindowPixmap :: NameWindowPixmap -> PIXMAP
data GetOverlayWindow

right_ExpandRegion :: ExpandRegion -> Word16
top_ExpandRegion :: ExpandRegion -> Word16
bottom_ExpandRegion :: ExpandRegion -> Word16
data HideCursor

window_HideCursor :: HideCursor -> WINDOW
data ShowCursor

module Graphics.XHB.Gen.RandR
extension :: ExtensionId
queryVersion :: Connection -> Word32 -> Word32 -> IO (Receipt QueryVersionReply)
setScreenConfig :: Connection -> SetScreenConfig -> IO (Receipt SetScreenConfigReply)
selectInput :: Connection -> WINDOW -> [NotifyMask] -> IO ()
getScreenInfo :: Connection -> WINDOW -> IO (Receipt GetScreenInfoReply)
getScreenSizeRange :: Connection -> WINDOW -> IO (Receipt GetScreenSizeRangeReply)
setScreenSize :: Connection -> SetScreenSize -> IO ()
getScreenResources :: Connection -> WINDOW -> IO (Receipt GetScreenResourcesReply)
getOutputInfo :: Connection -> OUTPUT -> TIMESTAMP -> IO (Receipt GetOutputInfoReply)
listOutputProperties :: Connection -> OUTPUT -> IO (Receipt ListOutputPropertiesReply)
queryOutputProperty :: Connection -> OUTPUT -> ATOM -> IO (Receipt QueryOutputPropertyReply)
configureOutputProperty :: Connection -> ConfigureOutputProperty -> IO ()
changeOutputProperty :: Connection -> ChangeOutputProperty -> IO ()
deleteOutputProperty :: Connection -> OUTPUT -> ATOM -> IO ()
getOutputProperty :: Connection -> GetOutputProperty -> IO (Receipt GetOutputPropertyReply)
createMode :: Connection -> CreateMode -> IO (Receipt MODE)
destroyMode :: Connection -> MODE -> IO ()
addOutputMode :: Connection -> OUTPUT -> MODE -> IO ()
deleteOutputMode :: Connection -> OUTPUT -> MODE -> IO ()
getCrtcInfo :: Connection -> CRTC -> TIMESTAMP -> IO (Receipt GetCrtcInfoReply)
setCrtcConfig :: Connection -> SetCrtcConfig -> IO (Receipt SetCrtcConfigReply)
getCrtcGammaSize :: Connection -> CRTC -> IO (Receipt Word16)
getCrtcGamma :: Connection -> CRTC -> IO (Receipt GetCrtcGammaReply)
setCrtcGamma :: Connection -> SetCrtcGamma -> IO ()
getScreenResourcesCurrent :: Connection -> WINDOW -> IO (Receipt GetScreenResourcesCurrentReply)
setCrtcTransform :: Connection -> SetCrtcTransform -> IO ()
getCrtcTransform :: Connection -> CRTC -> IO (Receipt GetCrtcTransformReply)
getPanning :: Connection -> CRTC -> IO (Receipt GetPanningReply)
setPanning :: Connection -> SetPanning -> IO (Receipt SetPanningReply)
setOutputPrimary :: Connection -> WINDOW -> OUTPUT -> IO ()
getOutputPrimary :: Connection -> WINDOW -> IO (Receipt OUTPUT)
deserializeError :: Word8 -> Maybe (Get SomeError)
deserializeEvent :: Word8 -> Maybe (Get SomeEvent)

data CRTC
data OUTPUT

data GetScreenResourcesCurrent
MkGetScreenResourcesCurrent :: WINDOW -> GetScreenResourcesCurrent
window_GetScreenResourcesCurrent :: GetScreenResourcesCurrent -> WINDOW
data GetScreenResourcesCurrentReply
MkGetScreenResourcesCurrentReply :: TIMESTAMP -> TIMESTAMP -> Word16 -> Word16 -> Word16 -> Word16 -> [CRTC] -> [OUTPUT] -> [ModeInfo] -> [Word8] -> GetScreenResourcesCurrentReply
timestamp_GetScreenResourcesCurrentReply :: GetScreenResourcesCurrentReply -> TIMESTAMP
config_timestamp_GetScreenResourcesCurrentReply :: GetScreenResourcesCurrentReply -> TIMESTAMP
num_crtcs_GetScreenResourcesCurrentReply :: GetScreenResourcesCurrentReply -> Word16
num_outputs_GetScreenResourcesCurrentReply :: GetScreenResourcesCurrentReply -> Word16
num_modes_GetScreenResourcesCurrentReply :: GetScreenResourcesCurrentReply -> Word16
names_len_GetScreenResourcesCurrentReply :: GetScreenResourcesCurrentReply -> Word16
crtcs_GetScreenResourcesCurrentReply :: GetScreenResourcesCurrentReply -> [CRTC]
outputs_GetScreenResourcesCurrentReply :: GetScreenResourcesCurrentReply -> [OUTPUT]
modes_GetScreenResourcesCurrentReply :: GetScreenResourcesCurrentReply -> [ModeInfo]
names_GetScreenResourcesCurrentReply :: GetScreenResourcesCurrentReply -> [Word8]
data SetCrtcTransform
MkSetCrtcTransform :: CRTC -> TRANSFORM -> Word16 -> [CChar] -> [FIXED] -> SetCrtcTransform
crtc_SetCrtcTransform :: SetCrtcTransform -> CRTC
transform_SetCrtcTransform :: SetCrtcTransform -> TRANSFORM

filter_params_SetCrtcTransform :: SetCrtcTransform -> [FIXED]
data GetCrtcTransform
MkGetCrtcTransform :: CRTC -> GetCrtcTransform
crtc_GetCrtcTransform :: GetCrtcTransform -> CRTC

pending_transform_GetCrtcTransformReply :: GetCrtcTransformReply -> TRANSFORM

pending_len_GetCrtcTransformReply :: GetCrtcTransformReply -> Word16
pending_nparams_GetCrtcTransformReply :: GetCrtcTransformReply -> Word16

current_nparams_GetCrtcTransformReply :: GetCrtcTransformReply -> Word16

current_filter_name_GetCrtcTransformReply :: GetCrtcTransformReply -> [CChar]
current_params_GetCrtcTransformReply :: GetCrtcTransformReply -> [FIXED]

crtc_GetPanning :: GetPanning -> CRTC

top_GetPanningReply :: GetPanningReply -> Word16

height_GetPanningReply :: GetPanningReply -> Word16

track_height_GetPanningReply :: GetPanningReply -> Word16

border_top_GetPanningReply :: GetPanningReply -> Int16

border_bottom_GetPanningReply :: GetPanningReply -> Int16

NotifyCrtcChange :: Notify
NotifyOutputChange :: Notify
NotifyOutputProperty :: Notify
data CrtcChange
MkCrtcChange :: TIMESTAMP -> WINDOW -> CRTC -> MODE -> [Rotation] -> Int16 -> Int16 -> Word16 -> Word16 -> CrtcChange
timestamp_CrtcChange :: CrtcChange -> TIMESTAMP
window_CrtcChange :: CrtcChange -> WINDOW
crtc_CrtcChange :: CrtcChange -> CRTC
mode_CrtcChange :: CrtcChange -> MODE
rotation_CrtcChange :: CrtcChange -> [Rotation]
x_CrtcChange :: CrtcChange -> Int16
y_CrtcChange :: CrtcChange -> Int16
width_CrtcChange :: CrtcChange -> Word16
height_CrtcChange :: CrtcChange -> Word16
data OutputChange
MkOutputChange :: TIMESTAMP -> TIMESTAMP -> WINDOW -> OUTPUT -> CRTC -> MODE -> [Rotation] -> Connection -> SubPixel -> OutputChange
timestamp_OutputChange :: OutputChange -> TIMESTAMP
config_timestamp_OutputChange :: OutputChange -> TIMESTAMP
window_OutputChange :: OutputChange -> WINDOW
output_OutputChange :: OutputChange -> OUTPUT
crtc_OutputChange :: OutputChange -> CRTC
mode_OutputChange :: OutputChange -> MODE
rotation_OutputChange :: OutputChange -> [Rotation]
connection_OutputChange :: OutputChange -> Connection
subpixel_order_OutputChange :: OutputChange -> SubPixel
data OutputProperty

window_OutputProperty :: OutputProperty -> WINDOW
output_OutputProperty :: OutputProperty -> OUTPUT
atom_OutputProperty :: OutputProperty -> ATOM
timestamp_OutputProperty :: OutputProperty -> TIMESTAMP
status_OutputProperty :: OutputProperty -> Property
data NotifyEvent
MkNotifyEvent :: Notify -> NotifyData -> NotifyEvent
subCode_NotifyEvent :: NotifyEvent -> Notify
u_NotifyEvent :: NotifyEvent -> NotifyData
data NotifyData
NotifyDataCrtcChange :: CrtcChange -> NotifyData

NotifyDataOutputProperty :: OutputProperty -> NotifyData

module Graphics.XHB.Gen.Render
extension :: ExtensionId
queryVersion :: Connection -> Word32 -> Word32 -> IO (Receipt QueryVersionReply)
queryPictFormats :: Connection -> IO (Receipt QueryPictFormatsReply)
queryPictIndexValues :: Connection -> PICTFORMAT -> IO (Receipt QueryPictIndexValuesReply)
createPicture :: Connection -> CreatePicture -> IO ()
changePicture :: Connection -> PICTURE -> ValueParam Word32 -> IO ()
setPictureClipRectangles :: Connection -> SetPictureClipRectangles -> IO ()
freePicture :: Connection -> PICTURE -> IO ()
composite :: Connection -> Composite -> IO ()
trapezoids :: Connection -> Trapezoids -> IO ()
triangles :: Connection -> Triangles -> IO ()
triStrip :: Connection -> TriStrip -> IO ()
triFan :: Connection -> TriFan -> IO ()
createGlyphSet :: Connection -> GLYPHSET -> PICTFORMAT -> IO ()
referenceGlyphSet :: Connection -> GLYPHSET -> GLYPHSET -> IO ()
freeGlyphSet :: Connection -> GLYPHSET -> IO ()
addGlyphs :: Connection -> AddGlyphs -> IO ()
freeGlyphs :: Connection -> GLYPHSET -> [GLYPH] -> IO ()
compositeGlyphs8 :: Connection -> CompositeGlyphs8 -> IO ()
compositeGlyphs16 :: Connection -> CompositeGlyphs16 -> IO ()
compositeGlyphs32 :: Connection -> CompositeGlyphs32 -> IO ()
fillRectangles :: Connection -> FillRectangles -> IO ()
createCursor :: Connection -> CreateCursor -> IO ()
setPictureTransform :: Connection -> PICTURE -> TRANSFORM -> IO ()
queryFilters :: Connection -> DRAWABLE -> IO (Receipt QueryFiltersReply)
setPictureFilter :: Connection -> SetPictureFilter -> IO ()
createAnimCursor :: Connection -> CURSOR -> [ANIMCURSORELT] -> IO ()
addTraps :: Connection -> AddTraps -> IO ()
createSolidFill :: Connection -> PICTURE -> COLOR -> IO ()
createLinearGradient :: Connection -> CreateLinearGradient -> IO ()
createRadialGradient :: Connection -> CreateRadialGradient -> IO ()
createConicalGradient :: Connection -> CreateConicalGradient -> IO ()
deserializeError :: Word8 -> Maybe (Get SomeError)
deserializeEvent :: Word8 -> Maybe (Get SomeEvent)

filter_len_SetPictureFilter :: SetPictureFilter -> Word16
filter_SetPictureFilter :: SetPictureFilter -> [CChar]
values_SetPictureFilter :: SetPictureFilter -> [FIXED]
data ANIMCURSORELT
MkANIMCURSORELT :: CURSOR -> Word32 -> ANIMCURSORELT
cursor_ANIMCURSORELT :: ANIMCURSORELT -> CURSOR
delay_ANIMCURSORELT :: ANIMCURSORELT -> Word32
data CreateAnimCursor
MkCreateAnimCursor :: CURSOR -> [ANIMCURSORELT] -> CreateAnimCursor
cid_CreateAnimCursor :: CreateAnimCursor -> CURSOR
cursors_CreateAnimCursor :: CreateAnimCursor -> [ANIMCURSORELT]
data SPANFIX
MkSPANFIX :: FIXED -> FIXED -> FIXED -> SPANFIX
l_SPANFIX :: SPANFIX -> FIXED
r_SPANFIX :: SPANFIX -> FIXED
y_SPANFIX :: SPANFIX -> FIXED
data TRAP

top_TRAP :: TRAP -> SPANFIX
bot_TRAP :: TRAP -> SPANFIX

picture_AddTraps :: AddTraps -> PICTURE
x_off_AddTraps :: AddTraps -> Int16
y_off_AddTraps :: AddTraps -> Int16
traps_AddTraps :: AddTraps -> [TRAP]
data CreateSolidFill
MkCreateSolidFill :: PICTURE -> COLOR -> CreateSolidFill
picture_CreateSolidFill :: CreateSolidFill -> PICTURE
color_CreateSolidFill :: CreateSolidFill -> COLOR
data CreateLinearGradient
MkCreateLinearGradient :: PICTURE -> POINTFIX -> POINTFIX -> Word32 -> [FIXED] -> [COLOR] -> CreateLinearGradient
picture_CreateLinearGradient :: CreateLinearGradient -> PICTURE
p1_CreateLinearGradient :: CreateLinearGradient -> POINTFIX
p2_CreateLinearGradient :: CreateLinearGradient -> POINTFIX
num_stops_CreateLinearGradient :: CreateLinearGradient -> Word32
stops_CreateLinearGradient :: CreateLinearGradient -> [FIXED]

data QueryAlarmReply
MkQueryAlarmReply :: TRIGGER -> INT64 -> Bool -> ALARMSTATE -> QueryAlarmReply
trigger_QueryAlarmReply :: QueryAlarmReply -> TRIGGER
delta_QueryAlarmReply :: QueryAlarmReply -> INT64
events_QueryAlarmReply :: QueryAlarmReply -> Bool
state_QueryAlarmReply :: QueryAlarmReply -> ALARMSTATE
data SetPriority
MkSetPriority :: Word32 -> Int32 -> SetPriority
id_SetPriority :: SetPriority -> Word32
priority_SetPriority :: SetPriority -> Int32
data GetPriority
MkGetPriority :: Word32 -> GetPriority
id_GetPriority :: GetPriority -> Word32
data GetPriorityReply
MkGetPriorityReply :: Int32 -> GetPriorityReply
priority_GetPriorityReply :: GetPriorityReply -> Int32
data CounterNotifyEvent
MkCounterNotifyEvent :: Word8 -> COUNTER -> INT64 -> INT64 -> TIMESTAMP -> Word16 -> Bool -> CounterNotifyEvent
kind_CounterNotifyEvent :: CounterNotifyEvent -> Word8
counter_CounterNotifyEvent :: CounterNotifyEvent -> COUNTER
wait_value_CounterNotifyEvent :: CounterNotifyEvent -> INT64
counter_value_CounterNotifyEvent :: CounterNotifyEvent -> INT64
timestamp_CounterNotifyEvent :: CounterNotifyEvent -> TIMESTAMP
count_CounterNotifyEvent :: CounterNotifyEvent -> Word16
destroyed_CounterNotifyEvent :: CounterNotifyEvent -> Bool
data AlarmNotifyEvent
MkAlarmNotifyEvent :: Word8 -> ALARM -> INT64 -> INT64 -> TIMESTAMP -> ALARMSTATE -> AlarmNotifyEvent
kind_AlarmNotifyEvent :: AlarmNotifyEvent -> Word8
alarm_AlarmNotifyEvent :: AlarmNotifyEvent -> ALARM
counter_value_AlarmNotifyEvent :: AlarmNotifyEvent -> INT64
alarm_value_AlarmNotifyEvent :: AlarmNotifyEvent -> INT64
timestamp_AlarmNotifyEvent :: AlarmNotifyEvent -> TIMESTAMP
state_AlarmNotifyEvent :: AlarmNotifyEvent -> ALARMSTATE

time_SetDeviceFocus :: SetDeviceFocus -> TIMESTAMP
revert_to_SetDeviceFocus :: SetDeviceFocus -> InputFocus
device_id_SetDeviceFocus :: SetDeviceFocus -> Word8

data FeedbackClass

FeedbackClassBell :: FeedbackClass

buttons_DeviceStateNotifyEvent :: DeviceStateNotifyEvent -> [Word8]
keys_DeviceStateNotifyEvent :: DeviceStateNotifyEvent -> [Word8]
valuators_DeviceStateNotifyEvent :: DeviceStateNotifyEvent -> [Word32]

name_AttributeInfo :: AttributeInfo -> [CChar]
data ImageFormatInfo
MkImageFormatInfo :: Word32 -> ImageFormatInfoType -> ImageOrder -> [Word8] -> Word8 -> Word8 -> Word8 -> Word32 -> Word32 -> Word32 -> ImageFormatInfoFormat -> Word32 -> Word32 -> Word32 -> Word32 -> Word32 -> Word32 -> Word32 -> Word32 -> Word32 -> [Word8] -> ScanlineOrder -> ImageFormatInfo
id_ImageFormatInfo :: ImageFormatInfo -> Word32
type_ImageFormatInfo :: ImageFormatInfo -> ImageFormatInfoType
byte_order_ImageFormatInfo :: ImageFormatInfo -> ImageOrder
guid_ImageFormatInfo :: ImageFormatInfo -> [Word8]
bpp_ImageFormatInfo :: ImageFormatInfo -> Word8
num_planes_ImageFormatInfo :: ImageFormatInfo -> Word8
depth_ImageFormatInfo :: ImageFormatInfo -> Word8
red_mask_ImageFormatInfo :: ImageFormatInfo -> Word32
green_mask_ImageFormatInfo :: ImageFormatInfo -> Word32
blue_mask_ImageFormatInfo :: ImageFormatInfo -> Word32
format_ImageFormatInfo :: ImageFormatInfo -> ImageFormatInfoFormat
y_sample_bits_ImageFormatInfo :: ImageFormatInfo -> Word32
u_sample_bits_ImageFormatInfo :: ImageFormatInfo -> Word32
v_sample_bits_ImageFormatInfo :: ImageFormatInfo -> Word32
vhorz_y_period_ImageFormatInfo :: ImageFormatInfo -> Word32
vhorz_u_period_ImageFormatInfo :: ImageFormatInfo -> Word32
vhorz_v_period_ImageFormatInfo :: ImageFormatInfo -> Word32
vvert_y_period_ImageFormatInfo :: ImageFormatInfo -> Word32
vvert_u_period_ImageFormatInfo :: ImageFormatInfo -> Word32
vvert_v_period_ImageFormatInfo :: ImageFormatInfo -> Word32
vcomp_order_ImageFormatInfo :: ImageFormatInfo -> [Word8]
vscanline_order_ImageFormatInfo :: ImageFormatInfo -> ScanlineOrder
data VideoNotifyEvent

reason_VideoNotifyEvent :: VideoNotifyEvent -> VideoNotifyReason

drawable_VideoNotifyEvent :: VideoNotifyEvent -> DRAWABLE
port_VideoNotifyEvent :: VideoNotifyEvent -> PORT

attribute_PortNotifyEvent :: PortNotifyEvent -> ATOM
value_PortNotifyEvent :: PortNotifyEvent -> Int32
data QueryExtension

data QueryExtensionReply

minor_QueryExtensionReply :: QueryExtensionReply -> Word16
data QueryAdaptors

info_QueryAdaptorsReply :: QueryAdaptorsReply -> [AdaptorInfo]
data QueryEncodings

time_UngrabPort :: UngrabPort -> TIMESTAMP
data PutVideo

drw_h_PutVideo :: PutVideo -> Word16

data ListImageFormats

data PutImage
MkPutImage :: PORT -> DRAWABLE -> GCONTEXT -> Word32 -> Int16 -> Int16 -> Word16 -> Word16 -> Int16 -> Int16 -> Word16 -> Word16 -> Word16 -> Word16 -> [Word8] -> PutImage
port_PutImage :: PutImage -> PORT
drawable_PutImage :: PutImage -> DRAWABLE

data ShmPutImage

src_y_ShmPutImage :: ShmPutImage -> Int16

drw_y_ShmPutImage :: ShmPutImage -> Int16
drw_w_ShmPutImage :: ShmPutImage -> Word16
drw_h_ShmPutImage :: ShmPutImage -> Word16

height_ShmPutImage :: ShmPutImage -> Word16
send_event_ShmPutImage :: ShmPutImage -> Word8

module Graphics.XHB.Gen.XvMC
extension :: ExtensionId
queryVersion :: Connection -> IO (Receipt QueryVersionReply)
listSurfaceTypes :: Connection -> PORT -> IO (Receipt ListSurfaceTypesReply)
createContext :: Connection -> CreateContext -> IO (Receipt CreateContextReply)
destroyContext :: Connection -> CONTEXT -> IO ()
createSurface :: Connection -> SURFACE -> CONTEXT -> IO (Receipt [Word32])
destroySurface :: Connection -> SURFACE -> IO ()
createSubpicture :: Connection -> CreateSubpicture -> IO (Receipt CreateSubpictureReply)
destroySubpicture :: Connection -> SUBPICTURE -> IO ()
listSubpictureTypes :: Connection -> PORT -> SURFACE -> IO (Receipt ListSubpictureTypesReply)
deserializeError :: Word8 -> Maybe (Get SomeError)
deserializeEvent :: Word8 -> Maybe (Get SomeEvent)
data CONTEXT
data SURFACE
data SUBPICTURE
data SurfaceInfo
MkSurfaceInfo :: SURFACE -> Word16 -> Word16 -> Word16 -> Word16 -> Word16 -> Word16 -> Word32 -> Word32 -> SurfaceInfo
id_SurfaceInfo :: SurfaceInfo -> SURFACE
chroma_format_SurfaceInfo :: SurfaceInfo -> Word16
pad0_SurfaceInfo :: SurfaceInfo -> Word16
max_width_SurfaceInfo :: SurfaceInfo -> Word16
max_height_SurfaceInfo :: SurfaceInfo -> Word16
subpicture_max_width_SurfaceInfo :: SurfaceInfo -> Word16
subpicture_max_height_SurfaceInfo :: SurfaceInfo -> Word16
mc_type_SurfaceInfo :: SurfaceInfo -> Word32
flags_SurfaceInfo :: SurfaceInfo -> Word32
data QueryVersion
MkQueryVersion :: QueryVersion
data QueryVersionReply
MkQueryVersionReply :: Word32 -> Word32 -> QueryVersionReply
major_QueryVersionReply :: QueryVersionReply -> Word32
minor_QueryVersionReply :: QueryVersionReply -> Word32
data ListSurfaceTypes
MkListSurfaceTypes :: PORT -> ListSurfaceTypes
port_id_ListSurfaceTypes :: ListSurfaceTypes -> PORT
data ListSurfaceTypesReply
MkListSurfaceTypesReply :: Word32 -> [SurfaceInfo] -> ListSurfaceTypesReply
num_ListSurfaceTypesReply :: ListSurfaceTypesReply -> Word32
surfaces_ListSurfaceTypesReply :: ListSurfaceTypesReply -> [SurfaceInfo]
data CreateContext
MkCreateContext :: CONTEXT -> PORT -> SURFACE -> Word16 -> Word16 -> Word32 -> CreateContext
context_id_CreateContext :: CreateContext -> CONTEXT
port_id_CreateContext :: CreateContext -> PORT
surface_id_CreateContext :: CreateContext -> SURFACE
width_CreateContext :: CreateContext -> Word16
height_CreateContext :: CreateContext -> Word16
flags_CreateContext :: CreateContext -> Word32
data CreateContextReply
MkCreateContextReply :: Word16 -> Word16 -> Word32 -> [Word32] -> CreateContextReply
width_actual_CreateContextReply :: CreateContextReply -> Word16
height_actual_CreateContextReply :: CreateContextReply -> Word16
flags_return_CreateContextReply :: CreateContextReply -> Word32
priv_data_CreateContextReply :: CreateContextReply -> [Word32]
data DestroyContext
MkDestroyContext :: CONTEXT -> DestroyContext
context_id_DestroyContext :: DestroyContext -> CONTEXT
data CreateSurface
MkCreateSurface :: SURFACE -> CONTEXT -> CreateSurface
surface_id_CreateSurface :: CreateSurface -> SURFACE
context_id_CreateSurface :: CreateSurface -> CONTEXT
data CreateSurfaceReply
MkCreateSurfaceReply :: [Word32] -> CreateSurfaceReply
priv_data_CreateSurfaceReply :: CreateSurfaceReply -> [Word32]
data DestroySurface
MkDestroySurface :: SURFACE -> DestroySurface
surface_id_DestroySurface :: DestroySurface -> SURFACE
data CreateSubpicture
MkCreateSubpicture :: SUBPICTURE -> CONTEXT -> Word32 -> Word16 -> Word16 -> CreateSubpicture
subpicture_id_CreateSubpicture :: CreateSubpicture -> SUBPICTURE
context_CreateSubpicture :: CreateSubpicture -> CONTEXT
xvimage_id_CreateSubpicture :: CreateSubpicture -> Word32
width_CreateSubpicture :: CreateSubpicture -> Word16
height_CreateSubpicture :: CreateSubpicture -> Word16
data CreateSubpictureReply
MkCreateSubpictureReply :: Word16 -> Word16 -> Word16 -> Word16 -> [Word8] -> [Word32] -> CreateSubpictureReply
width_actual_CreateSubpictureReply :: CreateSubpictureReply -> Word16
height_actual_CreateSubpictureReply :: CreateSubpictureReply -> Word16
num_palette_entries_CreateSubpictureReply :: CreateSubpictureReply -> Word16
entry_bytes_CreateSubpictureReply :: CreateSubpictureReply -> Word16
component_order_CreateSubpictureReply :: CreateSubpictureReply -> [Word8]
priv_data_CreateSubpictureReply :: CreateSubpictureReply -> [Word32]
data DestroySubpicture
MkDestroySubpicture :: SUBPICTURE -> DestroySubpicture
subpicture_id_DestroySubpicture :: DestroySubpicture -> SUBPICTURE
data ListSubpictureTypes
MkListSubpictureTypes :: PORT -> SURFACE -> ListSubpictureTypes
port_id_ListSubpictureTypes :: ListSubpictureTypes -> PORT
surface_id_ListSubpictureTypes :: ListSubpictureTypes -> SURFACE
data ListSubpictureTypesReply
MkListSubpictureTypesReply :: Word32 -> [ImageFormatInfo] -> ListSubpictureTypesReply
num_ListSubpictureTypesReply :: ListSubpictureTypesReply -> Word32
types_ListSubpictureTypesReply :: ListSubpictureTypesReply -> [ImageFormatInfo]


-- | X Haskell Bindings This module containes (or re-exports) the core
--   functionality needed to communicate with an X server.
--   
--   No frills.
--   
--   If you'd like to work with an extension to the X Protocol, you should
--   be able to find what you're looking for in one of the
--   Graphics.XHB.Gen.* modules. Also, the module
--   Graphics.XHB.Connection.Extension may be of use.
module Graphics.XHB
data Xid
class XidLike a
fromXid :: XidLike a => Xid -> a
toXid :: XidLike a => a -> Xid
xidNone :: Xid
class SimpleEnum a
toValue :: (SimpleEnum a, Eq n, Num n) => a -> n
fromValue :: (SimpleEnum a, Eq n, Num n) => n -> a
class BitEnum a
toBit :: BitEnum a => a -> Int
fromBit :: BitEnum a => Int -> a
fromMask :: (Bits b, BitEnum e) => b -> [e]
toMask :: (Bits b, Num b, BitEnum e) => [e] -> b
data ValueParam a
toValueParam :: (Bits a, Num a, BitEnum e) => [(e, Word32)] -> ValueParam a
fromValueParam :: (Bits a, BitEnum e) => ValueParam a -> [(e, Word32)]
emptyValueParam :: Num a => ValueParam a
stringToCList :: String -> [CChar]
data Receipt a

-- | Extracts a reply from the receipt from the request. Blocks until the
--   reply is available.
getReply :: Receipt a -> IO (Either SomeError a)
class (Typeable a, Show a) => Error a where fromError (SomeError e) = cast e toError = SomeError
fromError :: Error a => SomeError -> Maybe a
toError :: Error a => a -> SomeError
data SomeError
data UnknownError
UnknownError :: ByteString -> UnknownError
class Typeable a => Event a where fromEvent (SomeEvent e) = cast e toEvent = SomeEvent
fromEvent :: Event a => SomeEvent -> Maybe a
toEvent :: Event a => a -> SomeEvent
data SomeEvent
data UnknownEvent
UnknownEvent :: ByteString -> UnknownEvent
